name: New Jinteki Mind Game
description: This deck intends to use install and advance card on the normal turns while Punitive, neural EMP, and Fetal AI combo as finish move. While doing so I have to generate lots of credits to support it. The only thing I concern I might be low on ices to hold against account siphon and key hole runs. Any suggestion of how to improve this deck?

name: kit jbc
Jinteki JBC CHAMPS
Next Level 5.0
description: Includes lots of cheap ice to support NEXT Design and Accelerated Beta Test. Click intensive economy with Efficiency Committee, Gila, & Melange.

name: Mac & Cheese 5.0
description: Kate is travelling light with her portable rig of recurring tricks.

name: Jinteki Evolved
description: Don't want to get boring about this; it's a Jinteki trapdeck with some HB stuff i fell in love with while playing a ST deck. Still have to test it, tho. Tried to maintain a balanced defense and a high damage, had to cope with influence a bit this time. Tell me whaddaya think!

name: Through the Keyhole 3.0
description: I reworking of my Keyhole deck. Whizzard has been working well...I'm completely happy with the ID choice. I decided to go Gordian over you because I'm using Sucker tokens for too much. Mimic, you, parasite, all need tokens to work best and it's difficult to always have enough, especially against better players. I also went with two special orders so I can tutor for whatever I need to get into R&D as well as corroder cuz wraparound. One Levy for mid to late game reset and hand fill. One new members chip just for extra MU. I'm not sold on the cyber solutions, I think akimetsu will be fine, but hey...shiny new card. :)

name: Fun psycho deck. V1.0
description:
This combo need 7 tags.It's easy with fat economy and Midseason Replacements ...

Power Shutdown >for discard all deck Jackson Howard forrescue Interns + 2 Psychographics Play Interns and install Project Beale Play Psychographics for 7$ + Psychographics for 6$ 7 points, game over you win ! ^^

name: Rogue/Thief
description: Mystery, my friends....mystery.

name: HB - Damage
description: More mystery, friends..

name: Better Weyland
Extreme aggression 2.0
LLDS processor V. HJ.1.5
description: After a bit of play testing I've decided pipeline is better than ninja. The one str is cheaper against swordsman and the 2 str ICE that are common. This allows more aggression early. I also needed more draw so I went with one Mr Li and another Levy replacing infiltration with them. Subtle tweaks but I feel the deck is better now. Man I missed cyberfeeders. ;)

name: No World For Beowulf
description: corporate dominance. Get money, always install double advance in order to get atlas counters interns is for grndl. I have gotten insane amounts of cash out of the refinery and made them scared to run anything.

name: bag and tag
Noise Mill v2
description: Playtested once with 53 cards in it to decide what cards to cull. Designed to avoid damage by avoiding accessing cards and winning with a mill strategy. Keyhole is great b/c I can choose what to mill, instead of milling blind. Mill the points so corp can't win, then ice, then powerful cards. I realize only 2 AI breakers is risky, but I have parasites to destroy ice.

name: Grndl Flatline
The world is MINE!
description: Just a deck concept I had. Except for character assassination, the whole agenda suite can be scored from hand three different ways. BL, Sansan grid, or Astroscript token.

name: Whizzard of the cost
Snoop taggy bag
Kati and Mr Li
HB Wall 1.3
description:
This just a Glacier HB deck I’ve been tinkering with for a while now. The core idea is simple, grind your opponent down with you ice, and use your agendas to get free ice out.

After quite a bit of tinkering I figured it was time to post it up for some feedback.

name: HB Wall 1.4
description:
This just a Glacier HB deck I’ve been tinkering with for a while now. The core idea is simple, grind your opponent down with you ice, and use your agendas to get free ice out.

After quite a bit of tinkering I figured it was time to post it up for some feedback.

name: Noisy Destruction v4.0
description: Won 1st Place Netrunner Store Championship Tournament, Dragon's Lair San Antonio

name: NBN - Super Turbo Advance v5.0
description: Won 1st Place Netrunner Store Championship Tournament, Dragon's Lair San Antonio

name: Weyland Strong Wall 2.0 Store Championship
description:
Similar to the previous version, except where I traded out cards like profiteering for Gila hands which I could later trash for Archer. And I replaced Hostile Take Over for Vulcan Coverup for that random 2 meat damage and another source to rez archer.

Also this deck won me the store tournament, winning 3 our of 4 matches.

name: Money Money Money 2.0 Store Championship
description:
Replacing liberated accounts with Pro Contacts, and putting a second gordian blade in, so I have a more reliable code gate breaker.

I won my store championship with this deck wining all 4 games.

name: Tourney runner deck
description:
Brief rundown posted here as well as a great site to go to for all netrunner community needs.

http://www.corpdraw.com http://www.corpdraw.com/forums/discussion/748/gabe-hates-government#Item_3

name: Tourney Deck corp
OmeKit
description: Was trying to figure out something exciting to do with this new Data Pack. I figured what cards go well with others? Well Kit is really good at making at least 1 easier run every turn, so Grifter ... she's also really good at getting through the first layer of ICE, but the last, well that's where the corp will usually put a non-code gate to stop you from using your Yog-a-Saur or Torch, which is where Omega comes in. Not sure where it's going, but I figured I'd put it up for some critique.

name: OmeKit
description: I wanted to try to make something exciting out of the new Data Pack for a runner. I figured Grifter would be interesting, as well as Omega. Both cards combo semi-well with Kit. She can usually make at least 1 successful run per turn (Grifter), and she already walks through the first piece of ICE with Torch, but that second? That's what Omega is for. When the corp really starts layering? Parasite, Datasucker, Clone Chip. Win condition? R&D dig, like always.
